projects.title: Centralized Power BI Dashboard for Database Operations
projects.description: Built a centralised dashboard in Power BI to monitor real-time database operations, including Jira intakes, server and database status, and DBA activities.

projects.title: UDeploy Pipeline Migration to Jenkins
projects.description: Migrated deployment pipelines from UDeploy to Jenkins, ensuring smooth transition and reliability.

responsibilities: Built centralized Power BI dashboards connected to Snowflake and Azure Portal APIs.
Migrated CI/CD pipelines to Jenkins using Bash automation.
Collaborated with DBA team for operational efficiency and documentation.
